sentences.en: A move that constitutes an inescapable and indefensible attack on a chess opponent's king.
sentences.cn: 将死国际象棋中的一着,攻击对手的国王使之无法逃脱或抵抗.

sentences.en: And that would include a President seeking to defend an indefensible budget.
sentences.cn: 对一位试图为站不住脚的预算辩护的总统来说也是如此.

sentences.en: Her silly behaviour puts her in an indefensible position.
sentences.cn: 她行为无聊,叫人无法原谅她.
他的行为是不可原谅的。
我觉得这样的行为是不可原谅的.

sentences.en: It is indefensible as a sport.
sentences.cn: 作为一种运动,这是站不住脚的.

sentences.en: That's an indefensible lie, " brother Jack said. "
sentences.cn: “ 这是漏洞百出的谎言, ” 杰克兄弟说.

sentences.en: The law is morally indefensible and in need of reform.
sentences.cn: 这项法令在道德上说不过去，需要改进。

sentences.en: The minister was accused of defending the indefensible.
sentences.cn: 那位大臣被指责庇护不可原谅的行为。

sentences.en: This inversion of power is indefensible.
This is an illegal and morally indefensible action.
sentences.cn: 这种行为既不合法律,在道德上也站不住脚.

sentences.en: To argue otherwise is trying to defend the indefensible.
sentences.cn: 持相反的论点就是试图为站不住脚的事情强辩。

words.tran_cn: 站不住脚的；不能防卫的；无辩护余地的

trans.tran_cn: 无法防御的，站不住脚的
trans.tran_en: too bad to be excused or defended
